name: Steal Yourself Demo
description:
This is the plot of Steal Yourself, a top-down shooter roguelite where thievery is the name of the game. You will be the one to decide your own value here in hell.

Keyboard Controls:

Movement: WASD Keys

Thieves' Dash: Spacebar

Use Weapon: Left Mouse Click

Throw Stolen Projectile: Right Mouse Click

Pause: Escape
